name: Darklake Hollow
description:
Darklake Hollow is a very early access adventure game, something I plan to develop further for a long time. Initially, it was a University project that I am now continuing to develop into a game.

I created all the models and music composition. The only thing that aren't mine are some of the textures and the ambient sound (anything that isn't music)

Feedback and comments would be very useful at this stage and I also have a list of bug fixes to do and shall get to these in due course.

Take a look at the YouTube video incase you get lost, a key bug is not having indication of story progress or direction of play which I am planning to do with visual and audio keys along with a UI update.
